sentences.en: Britain has an enviable record on breast screening for cancer.
sentences.cn: 英国妇女的乳腺癌患病率很低，着实令人羡慕。

sentences.en: Cancer of the breast in young women is uncommon.
sentences.cn: 乳腺癌在年轻女子当中并不常见。

sentences.en: Dick cradled her photograph against his breast.
sentences.cn: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

sentences.en: He reached into his breast pocket for his cigar case.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进胸前口袋里拿雪茄烟盒。

sentences.en: Her mother died of breast cancer.
I kept the list in my breast pocket.
sentences.cn: 我把名单放在了胸部的衣兜里。

sentences.en: Leading scientists claim breast-fed babies are intellectually brighter.
sentences.cn: 主流科学家宣称母乳喂养的婴儿更聪明。

sentences.en: One survey revealed a threefold increasein breast cancer.
sentences.cn: 一项调查显示乳腺癌的发病率已是原来的3倍。

sentences.en: She put the baby to her breast.
The cock's breast is tinged with chestnut.
sentences.cn: 这只公鸡胸部羽毛呈浅栗色，带有白色细条纹。

sentences.en: The president beat his breast and called that deal a mistake.
sentences.cn: 总裁捶胸顿足，称那是个错误的交易。

sentences.en: The verse rose up to fire his breast with inspiration.
sentences.cn: 这首诗激发了他的灵感。

sentences.en: There are many advantages to breast-feeding.
These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
sentences.cn: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.en: This special form of vitamin D is naturally present in breast milk.
sentences.cn: 这种特殊形态的维生素D天然存在于母乳中。

phrases.tran_cn: 捶胸（以示悲哀，失望或懊悔之情）

phrases.phrase: make a clean breast of something

trans.tran_en: the part of your body between your neck and your stomach

trans.tran_cn: 登上…的顶部，挺胸从…中挤过
